title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/tushie-blessing.html
notes:
SISTER ESTELLE





	Dear Miss Blessing,


Sister Tushie is spending the weekend in Smegaroon. She will return on Monday morning
when I am sure she will respond  to your letter as soon as possible.


Kindest Thoughts,


Sister Estelle
on Behalf of Sister Tushie Meshuganah
The Holy Bagel Community 
Edelson House
69 Bowden Avenue
London WC1 FU2
United Kingdom

SMEGAROON 
- Resort for Discerning Spies - Book Your Getaway Now!



THE HOLY BAGEL COMMUNITY - World Peace Through Yeast

UPDATE


When we last saw Agent Tushie, she had been approached by a poor orphan for help in retrieving an inheritance. True to form, the 'orphan' referred Tushie to a 'barrister' for the exact procedures involved.

messages.subject: hello dear
messages.body:
please write me through my yahoo mail address  (blessing_333@yahoo.com)
Hello my dear,
How are you and your day hope fine?my name is Blessing Ibrahim i am honest and caring woman seeking honest and caring friend please send me mail to my email address so that i will send you my pictures and tell you more about me (blessing_333@yahoo.com) i am waiting for your mail and your pictures.
Yours
Blessing

messages.body:
Hello Miss Blessing,


How are you today? Are you lonely? If so, do visit one of the houses run by
The Holy Bagel Community. We have places for young people all over Europe and 
West Africa and you will be welcome at any of these places.


Remain blessed,
SISTER TUSHIE 


THE HOLY BAGEL COMMUNITY
Ngoblah House 69 Aspis Avenue London WC1 FU2 England
tel: 0207 930 4832  e-mail: tushie@xxx-xxxxxxx.xxx
 Life President: Lonslo Tossov CH MC OBE 
    Honorary Treasurer: Sister Tushie Meshuganah 
             Honorary Secretary: Dr Isa Wankah FRCS, AA, RAC
           Bankers: Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International 


The Holy Bagel Community was established by Pastor Cecil Ngoblah in 1989 to cater for the material, moral and spiritual needs of young African students and workers living in Great Britain.  Although donations were received from several African states, the Community was beset by financial problems until 1998 when a student from Zambia - who at the time was renting a room in the Community's London hostel - won £9.5 million in the British National Lottery. 
The student  donated £1.5 million to Pastor Ngoblah and thanks to some wise investments the Community now owns hostels in London, Paris and West Africa and maintains a fund for indigents and charitable causes throughout Africa.
Any African of whatever race, colour or nationality may apply for assistance in the form of a loan or outright gift. All applications should be sent to Sister Tushie at the above address or by e-mail to: tushie@xxx-xxxxxxx.xxx
Sister Tushie Meshuganah
Honorary Treasurer
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: May 10, 2013
To: eunicewilliams@rock.com

Hello Miss Blessing,

How are you today? Are you lonely? If so, do visit one of the houses run by The Holy Bagel Community. We have places for young people all over Europe and West Africa and you will be welcome at any of these places.

Remain blessed,
SISTER TUSHIE

THE HOLY BAGEL COMMUNITY
Ngoblah House 69 Aspis Avenue London WC1 FU2 England
tel: 0207 930 4832 e-mail: tushie@xxx-xxxxxxx.xxx
Life President: Lonslo Tossov CH MC OBE
Honorary Treasurer: Sister Tushie Meshuganah
Honorary Secretary: Dr Isa Wankah FRCS, AA, RAC
Bankers: Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International

The Holy Bagel Community was established by Pastor Cecil Ngoblah in 1989 to cater for the material, moral and spiritual needs of young African students and workers living in Great Britain. Although donations were received from several African states, the Community was beset by financial problems until 1998 when a student from Zambia - who at the time was renting a room in the Community's London hostel - won £9.5 million in the British National Lottery.
The student [who wishes to remain anonymous] donated £1.5 million to Pastor Ngoblah and thanks to some wise investments the Community now owns hostels in London, Paris and West Africa and maintains a fund for indigents and charitable causes throughout Africa.
Any African of whatever race, colour or nationality may apply for assistance in the form of a loan or outright gift. All applications should be sent to Sister Tushie at the above address or by e-mail to: tushie@xxx-xxxxxxx.xxx
Sister Tushie Meshuganah
Honorary Treasurer

messages.subject: I WILL LIKE TO KNOW MORE ABOUT YOU
messages.body:
My dearest one,
Good morning
How is your day?.
Mine is a little bit cold over here in Dakar Senegal.
like i told you in my first mail, My name is Blessing Ibrahim I 'm 25,from Khartoum Sudan in northern Africa,5.11ft tall, Fair in complexion,(never married before )presently, i am residing in the
refugee camp here in Dakar, as a result of the civil war that was fought  in my country.


My late father! Dr, Malik Ibrahim, was the director general of ministry of health Khartoum Sudan, and he was the personal adviser to the former head of state, before the rebel's attacked our house one early morning  and  they killed my mother, also with my father in cold blood.


It was only me that is alive now,but I managed to make my way to a near by country Senegal , where i am  living now in a refugee camp,and this computer is belonging to Mr Luke Kamaga he is the person taking care of those in the refugee here in Dakar. I would like to know more about you.Your like and dislike,your hobby and what you are doing
presently.


I will tell you more about myself and what i have in mind if you can be honest and trust with me. in my next mail.
Attached here, is my picture.
Hoping to hear from you soonest,
Miss Blessing
messages.raw:
BLESSING IBRAHIM

Date: Sat, 11 May 2013
From: blessing_333@yahoo.com
Subject: I WILL LIKE TO KNOW MORE ABOUT YOU

My dearest one,
Good morning
How is your day?.
Mine is a little bit cold over here in Dakar Senegal.
like i told you in my first mail, My name is Blessing Ibrahim I 'm 25,from Khartoum Sudan in northern Africa,5.11ft tall, Fair in complexion,(never married before )presently, i am residing in the refugee camp here in Dakar, as a result of the civil war that was fought in my country.

My late father! Dr, Malik Ibrahim, was the director general of ministry of health Khartoum Sudan, and he was the personal adviser to the former head of state, before the rebel's attacked our house one early morning and they killed my mother, also with my father in cold blood.

It was only me that is alive now,but I managed to make my way to a near by country Senegal , where i am living now in a refugee camp,and this computer is belonging to Mr Luke Kamaga he is the person taking care of those in the refugee here in Dakar. I would like to know more about you.Your like and dislike,your hobby and what you are doing presently.

I will tell you more about myself and what i have in mind if you can be honest and trust with me. in my next mail.
Attached here, is my picture.
Hoping to hear from you soonest,
Miss Blessing

This is your basic Orphan's Inheritance format. But you knew that.

messages.body:
Dear Blessing,


How nice to hear from you. I am sorry to hear that you are one of the many refugees
in our African continent.  You would be far better living in the United Kingdom. If this
appeals to you just let me know and I will arrange for a sponsor to sign your application for 
political asylum. The Holy Bagel Community's pastor Bishop Ben Zoma and Mother Nelda  are well respected and their signatures will guarantee a visa for you.


Also, the Holy Bagel Community will  pay for your flight from Senegal although you would be
expected to repay this money once you have found work in the United Kingdom.


Remain blessed,
SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: May 11, 2013
To: Blessing Baby <blessing_333@yahoo.com>

Dear Blessing,

How nice to hear from you. I am sorry to hear that you are one of the many refugees in our African continent. You would be far better living in the United Kingdom. If this appeals to you just let me know and I will arrange for a sponsor to sign your application for political asylum. The Holy Bagel Community's pastor Bishop Ben Zoma and Mother Nelda [our religious leader] are well respected and their signatures will guarantee a visa for you.

Also, the Holy Bagel Community will pay for your flight from Senegal although you would be expected to repay this money once you have found work in the United Kingdom.

Remain blessed,
SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.subject: THIS IS MY FULL LIFE STORY WITH TRUST AND HONESTY
messages.body:
Hello Dearest,
How are you today?
I believe you are doing fine,
I am more than happy in your reply to my mail.
mine is a little bit hot over here in Dakar Senegal. Its just like one staying in the prison and i hope by Gods grace i will come out here soon.I don't have any relatives now whom we can go to all our relatives ran away in the middle of the war the only person I have now is Mr. Luke Kamaga  who is taking care of us here in the camp he has been very nice to me since i came here but i am not living with him rather i am leaving in the woman's hostel because the camp have two hostels one for men the other for women.


Mr Luke Kamaga Tel number is (+221-771694870) if you call tell him that you want to speak with me he will send for me in the hostel. As a refugee here i don't have any right or privileged to any thing be it money or whatever because it is against the law of this country.I want to go back to my studies because i only attended my first year before the incident that lead to my being in this situation now took place.


Please listen to this,i have my late father's statement of account and death certificate here with me which i will send to you latter,because when he was alive he deposited some amount of money in Bank of England which he used my name as the next of kin,the amount in question is $5.7M(Five Million seven Hundred Thousand Dollars). So i will like you to help me transfer this money to your account and from it you can send some money for me to get my traveling documents and air ticket to come over to meet with you.I kept this secret to people in the camp here the only person that knows about it is Mr Luke Kamaga because he is like a father to me.


So in the light of above i will like you to keep it to yourself and don't tell it to anyone for i am afraid of loosing my life and the money if people gets to know about it. Remember i am giving you all this information due to the trust i deposed on you.I like honest and understanding people,truthful and a man of vision,truth and hard working.
My favorite language is English but our language is Arabic but i speak English very fluently.Meanwhile i will like you to call me like i said i have allot to tell you.
Have a nice day and think about me.
Yours Blessing
messages.raw:
BLESSING IBRAHIM

Date: Mon, 13 May 2013
From: blessing_333@yahoo.com
Subject: THIS IS MY FULL LIFE STORY WITH TRUST AND HONESTY

Hello Dearest,
How are you today?
I believe you are doing fine,
I am more than happy in your reply to my mail.
mine is a little bit hot over here in Dakar Senegal. Its just like one staying in the prison and i hope by Gods grace i will come out here soon.I don't have any relatives now whom we can go to all our relatives ran away in the middle of the war the only person I have now is Mr. Luke Kamaga who is taking care of us here in the camp he has been very nice to me since i came here but i am not living with him rather i am leaving in the woman's hostel because the camp have two hostels one for men the other for women.

Mr Luke Kamaga Tel number is (+221-771694870) if you call tell him that you want to speak with me he will send for me in the hostel. As a refugee here i don't have any right or privileged to any thing be it money or whatever because it is against the law of this country.I want to go back to my studies because i only attended my first year before the incident that lead to my being in this situation now took place.

Please listen to this,i have my late father's statement of account and death certificate here with me which i will send to you latter,because when he was alive he deposited some amount of money in Bank of England which he used my name as the next of kin,the amount in question is $5.7M(Five Million seven Hundred Thousand Dollars). So i will like you to help me transfer this money to your account and from it you can send some money for me to get my traveling documents and air ticket to come over to meet with you.I kept this secret to people in the camp here the only person that knows about it is Mr Luke Kamaga because he is like a father to me.

So in the light of above i will like you to keep it to yourself and don't tell it to anyone for i am afraid of loosing my life and the money if people gets to know about it. Remember i am giving you all this information due to the trust i deposed on you.I like honest and understanding people,truthful and a man of vision,truth and hard working.
My favorite language is English but our language is Arabic but i speak English very fluently.Meanwhile i will like you to call me like i said i have allot to tell you.
Have a nice day and think about me.
Yours Blessing

messages.body:
Dear Baby Blessing,


I was very moved by your story. However, the inheritance from your late father
should make it easy for you to leave your refugee camp.Surely your
friend Mr Luke Kamaga could arrange for your money to be transferred into his account
- assuming of course that you trust him to give it back to you. If there is so much money 
available, it should be simple to give sizeable gifts to the bank officials who will then
transfer the cash to your account with no questions asked. I suggest you offer Mr Kamaga $10,000
for his trouble.


You will then be able to come to the UK to continue your studies. Our religious leaders
Bishop Ben Zoma and  Mother Nelda along with the head of our religious retreat Mother Estelle
will sign your visa application forms and you can stay at our London house for as long as you need.


As we say in my country of Smegaroon - gai kuck'n oif der yam,


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
www.freewebs.com/tushiem/
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: May 13, 2013

Dear Baby Blessing,

I was very moved by your story. However, the inheritance from your late father should make it easy for you to leave your refugee camp.Surely your friend Mr Luke Kamaga could arrange for your money to be transferred into his account - assuming of course that you trust him to give it back to you. If there is so much money available, it should be simple to give sizeable gifts to the bank officials who will then transfer the cash to your account with no questions asked. I suggest you offer Mr Kamaga $10,000 for his trouble.

You will then be able to come to the UK to continue your studies. Our religious leaders Bishop Ben Zoma and Mother Nelda along with the head of our religious retreat Mother Estelle will sign your visa application forms and you can stay at our London house for as long as you need.

As we say in my country of Smegaroon - gai kuck'n oif der yam,

SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
www.freewebs.com/tushiem/

messages.subject: please help me out
messages.body:
Hello Dearest,
Thank you for your mail. My prayer is for God to help me in every thing, Please i hope you will not betray the trust i have in you .  As i told you before, i live here in Senegal where i am looking for freedom as a foreign person due to this problem in my country . I want to come over to your country to start a new life and also finish my studies.As for age is just a number, About my late father's money that i told you, i want you to help me and stand on my behalf as my trustee or partner to transfer the money into account in your country .


That is why i decided to look for help from someone and i need you to stand on my behalf as my trustee to the bank and ask them how to transfer this fund into your position in your country. I have the statement of account of my late father plus his death certificate as i told you. Everything about this account is clear. Please, all that i have told you about my situation here is the real life am passing through right now. All i need you to do for me is to contact the bank on my behalf as my foreign partner, and let us know how to transfer the money into your position in your country.


I will like you to first contact the bank where this fund is deposited , let us first hear from the bank before doing any other thing. Please i am telling you all this about myself and situation with trust hoping that i am safe in your hand and that you will not betray me. No body knows what i have and where i am . And as i told you before, i don't go back home  to face the enemy my late father created when he was alive back in my country.  Please I'm asking you for my safety, keep it very private please, I know that God will help us do this transfer.


After transferring the money in an account in your country, you will then send me some money from there to get my traveling documents to come over to your country, as you know that i have nothing with me here. Also i will be very happy to hear your voice on the phone . So once i hear from you and also you mail me , I will send you the bank contact details , So that you will contact the bank about the account to find out how we can do about the transfer. I really appreciate your concern. Please, i will also need to know your phone number in case if i want to call and  also your address in your country so that we can know each other well. Please if you know you can do this , Because i don't want you to leave me half way. I will come back later to check your reply. Also, pleases try to call me on the reverend's phone number that i sent to you so that we can speak . Have a nice day, hoping to hear from you soon.
Your beloved One
blessing
messages.raw:
BLESSING IBRAHIM

Here we go...

Date: Tue, 14 May 2013
From: blessing_333@yahoo.com
Subject: please help me out

Hello Dearest,
Thank you for your mail. My prayer is for God to help me in every thing, Please i hope you will not betray the trust i have in you . messages.body:
Dear Blessing,


I don't think you have carefully read my last e-mail. I repeat again what
I suggested you do to get hold of your inheritance from your dear late father:


"Surely your friend Mr Luke Kamaga could arrange for your money to be transferred into his account- assuming of course that you trust him to give it back to you!


If there is so much money available, it should be simple to give sizeable gifts to the bank officials who will then transfer the cash to your account with no questions asked. Offer Mr Kamaga $10,000 for his trouble."  


Let me know what you think of this plan. If you want to speak to me or Mother Nelda our telephone number is 2084457419 .


SISTER TUSHIE xxx
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: May 14, 2013

Dear Blessing,

I don't think you have carefully read my last e-mail. I repeat again what I suggested you do to get hold of your inheritance from your dear late father:

"Surely your friend Mr Luke Kamaga could arrange for your money to be transferred into his account- assuming of course that you trust him to give it back to you!

If there is so much money available, it should be simple to give sizeable gifts to the bank officials who will then transfer the cash to your account with no questions asked. Offer Mr Kamaga $10,000 for his trouble."

Let me know what you think of this plan. If you want to speak to me or Mother Nelda our telephone number is 2084457419 [first dial the UK code].

SISTER TUSHIE xxx

messages.body:
My Dear,
Thanks for your mail. I also thank you for your concern and your advise.


But, I have to let you know that, Rev. Kamaga, is not My friend, Rather he is the one in charge of female hostel herein the camp. OK ?


Secondly, I have asked the Bank the easiest way of transfer this very Money to me. But , they made me to understand that the only way , easy way to release this Money to me , is for me to look for a foreign partner who will present his or herself as my partner. 


Then they will process the Money and transfer it to my foreign partner's bank account, with out any hitch.  WHY because, I am a refugee in another country, So I am not allowed to make any bank transaction , until i am free. OK ?.


So, Please, you have to help me to make sure that the Money is transferred to your bank account, then you prepare documents  for me to come over to continue with my studies .


I a waiting for your urgent reaction to this message.


I Love you.
God Bless yu.
Yours Blessing.
messages.raw:
BLESSING IBRAHIM

Date: Wed, 15 May 2013

My Dear,
Thanks for your mail. I also thank you for your concern and your advise.

But, I have to let you know that, Rev. Kamaga, is not My friend, Rather he is the one in charge of female hostel herein the camp. OK ?

Secondly, I have asked the Bank the easiest way of transfer this very Money to me. But , they made me to understand that the only way , easy way to release this Money to me , is for me to look for a foreign partner who will present his or herself as my partner.

Then they will process the Money and transfer it to my foreign partner's bank account, with out any hitch. WHY because, I am a refugee in another country, So I am not allowed to make any bank transaction , until i am free. OK ?.

So, Please, you have to help me to make sure that the Money is transferred to your bank account, then you prepare documents for me to come over to continue with my studies .

I a waiting for your urgent reaction to this message.

I Love you.
God Bless yu.
Yours Blessing.

messages.body:
Dear Blessing,


I'm sure you know best, my dear, but surely you can trust a man of God like Reverend Kamaga
to sort out your finances. On the other hand I accept that there are some rogue clergymen who
might take advantage of the situation. However, my close friend His Grace Bishop Lonslo Tossov
of the Mbalongawank Baptist Church is planning to visit Dakar early next month and I can assure you that he is a most trustworthy person. He is also a friend of the Mayor of Dakar, His Excellency Dr Khalifa
Sall and I am certain that Bishop Tossov would be happy to speak to him about your situation.


So would you like me to telephone Bishop Tossov and ask him to intercede on your behalf?


Remain blessed.
SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH


P.S. Mother Nelda says she has lit a candle on your behalf in the Holy Bagel Community
chapel here in London and prayers are also being said for you in our sister Community
in Los Angeles.
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: May 16, 2013

Dear Blessing,

I'm sure you know best, my dear, but surely you can trust a man of God like Reverend Kamaga to sort out your finances. On the other hand I accept that there are some rogue clergymen who might take advantage of the situation. However, my close friend His Grace Bishop Lonslo Tossov of the Mbalongawank Baptist Church is planning to visit Dakar early next month and I can assure you that he is a most trustworthy person. He is also a friend of the Mayor of Dakar, His Excellency Dr Khalifa Sall and I am certain that Bishop Tossov would be happy to speak to him about your situation.

So would you like me to telephone Bishop Tossov and ask him to intercede on your behalf?

Remain blessed.
SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

P.S. Mother Nelda says she has lit a candle on your behalf in the Holy Bagel Community chapel here in London and prayers are also being said for you in our sister Community in Los Angeles.

messages.body:
My Dear,


Your message was well received. And the whole contents were well understood.


Firstly, i want to thank you a million times for your concern, And that of the BISHOP.


You are free to do what ever you think that, can be of a help to me here. I a really passing through hell here. No Good food , no medication, we are only living like prisoners.


I will be very happy to see the Bishop when he comes to Dakar by next month. 


Meanwhile, I want you to contact this lawyer immediately you receive this message. The reverend Father kamaga , introduced him to me.  And he has visited me Twice here. He has advised me to permit him to ask the Bank to send the whole Money to one of the SECURITY and Finance Company herein Senegal.


Please, contact him and know  if he is capable to do so.


HERE IS HIS CONTACT:
BARRISTER LONGE KUDU.
E-mail: barlongekudus@justice.cm


He is attached to the federal high court of justice here in Dakar.


I Love you.


Yours .
Blessing.
messages.raw:
BLESSING IBRAHIM

Date: Fri, 17 May 2013

I will be very happy to see the Bishop when he comes to Dakar by next month.

Meanwhile, I want you to contact this lawyer immediately you receive this message. The reverend Father kamaga , introduced him to me. And he has visited me Twice here. He has advised me to permit him to ask the Bank to send the whole Money to one of the SECURITY and Finance Company herein Senegal.

Please, contact him and know if he is capable to do so.

HERE IS HIS CONTACT:
BARRISTER LONGE KUDU.

Yours .
Blessing.

messages.body:
My Dear Sister Estelle,


Thanks for your response .


I a waiting for Sister Tushie arrival by Monday.


God Bless you.


Yours.
Blessing.
messages.raw:
BLESSING IBRAHIM

Date: Mon, 20 May 2013

My Dear Sister Estelle,

Thanks for your response .

I a waiting for Sister Tushie arrival by Monday.

God Bless you.

Yours.
Blessing.

messages.body:
Dearest Blessing,
Very well - I will contact your lawyer as soon as I have dealt with all my
correspondence. 


I am also involved in the Holy Bagel Community's monthly
distribution of schnorrors to all deserving mendicants. As this involves
gifts to individual recipients of up to fifty Smegaroonian golden dorks
, you will appreciate I cannot 
process the paperwork quickly.


However, I will endeavour to contact your lawyer tomorrow or Wednesday.


Remain blessed,
SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: May 20, 2013

Dearest Blessing,
Very well - I will contact your lawyer as soon as I have dealt with all my correspondence.

I am also involved in the Holy Bagel Community's monthly distribution of schnorrors to all deserving mendicants. As this involves gifts to individual recipients of up to fifty Smegaroonian golden dorks [the equivalent of five hundred US dollars], you will appreciate I cannot process the paperwork quickly.

However, I will endeavour to contact your lawyer tomorrow or Wednesday.

Remain blessed,
SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.body:
Cc: 	Blessing Baby <blessing_333@yahoo.com>


	Dear Barrister Kudus,


Your name has been given to me by Miss Blessing 
as a reputable person who will assist her in transferring her legacy into a foreign bank account.


I will allow you to use The Holy Bagel Community's bank facilities in order for you to perform this
service. However, would you please confirm that you are willing to take on this work?


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
www.freewebs.com/tushiem/
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Sister Tushie dutifully contacts the "Barrister"

Date: May 22, 2013
To: barlongekudus@justice.com
Cc: Blessing Baby <blessing_333@yahoo.com>

Dear Barrister Kudus,

Your name has been given to me by Miss Blessing [as you will note from the correspondence] as a reputable person who will assist her in transferring her legacy into a foreign bank account.

I will allow you to use The Holy Bagel Community's bank facilities in order for you to perform this service. However, would you please confirm that you are willing to take on this work?

SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
www.freewebs.com/tushiem/

To be continued?

messages.body:
Cc: 	Blessing Baby <blessing_333@yahoo.com> 


Dear Mr Kudu,


Thank you for your e-mail. I am pleased you are able to assist in
the transfer of Miss Blessing's money to our bank account.


However, no mention of legal fees was made by Miss Blessing.
This should not create any problem so long as these fees are not exorbitant.
You should let me know the total of all costs involved as soon as possible and then
we can proceed.


Yours sincerely,


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

your mail was well received. My legal fee is not exorbitant. It is only $500, and with the additional cost of $550, for mobilization . In case I will be asked to travel to anywhere in the world for signing of any document.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Kudu,


Thank you for your prompt response.  


Your legal fee of $500 is acceptable. But surely there is no reason
for your to travel out of Dakar let alone Senegal to complete the necessary
modalities so I don't quite understand why you need another $550 for any
'mobilization' expenses.


Remain blessed,


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

messages.body:
1 June 2013


Dear Mr Kudu,


I realise that English is not your mother tongue which can lead to misunderstanding of
letters addressed to you.


Please do not take this as a criticism as I only speak English and French whilst I am
sure you are fluent in several African languages.


Therefore I must ask you to tell me again just how much will the legal fees be - US$500 or
US$550?  And as you agree there will be no travel expenses, I assume we can dispense with 
this further fee of US$500 'mobilization' expenses.


I shall be in Smegaroon until Tuesday evening. However, once I receive a confirmation 
of your fee we can proceed to complete these modalities without further delay.


Remain Blessed,


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

messages.body:
Dear Mr Kudu,


I have now read your e-mail of June 1st.


However, I must reiterate that whilst we are happy
to pay your legal fees of US$500, I have spoken to
Bishop Tossov of Mbalongawank and he agrees with me
that we cannot be responsible for your 'mobilization' expenses.


Therefore, if you accept that we will only send you US$500,
please let me know that you accept this proposition. Once 
I receive your acceptance, we can then proceed without further 
unnecessary delay.


I look forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.


As we say in  Smegaroon -  a beyzer gzar zol af der kumen,


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

I look forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.

messages.body:
THIS IS AN AUTOMATED REPLY


Our Founder Reverend Cecil Ngoblah is ninety years old on June 10th.


To celebrate this special birthday all Holy Bagel Community employees
have been invited to a three day celebration in Smegaroon.


Therefore this office will be closed until Tuesday June 11 and we apologise
for any inconvenience caused.S
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: June 8, 2013

To celebrate this special birthday all Holy Bagel Community employees have been invited to a three day celebration in Smegaroon.

Therefore this office will be closed until Tuesday June 11 and we apologise for any inconvenience caused.S

messages.body:
Dear Mr Kudu,


I am pleased to inform you that it will not be necessary to make a bank transfer
because - as I informed you in an earlier e-mail - the director of the Holy Bagel Community, Bishop Tossov of Mbalongawank, will be in Dakar this month and he has five hundred US dollars in cash to
pay your legal fees.


The Bishop will be in Dakar from Thursday June 13 to Sunday June 16 and is staying at the
Radisson Blu Hotel, Route de la Corniche Ouest. As you can imagine, he has many engagements
during this short stay. Therefore on Friday morning he will leave $500 in an envelope at the hotel
reception desk marked For the Attention of Mr Kudu. You will be asked to present proof of
identity - like a driving licence - and sign the receipt which is also in the envelope and give it to the
reception clerk.


If you have any queries feel free to contact Bishop Tossov at lonslo-tossov@hotmail.com


Remain blessed,


SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: June 11, 2013

Dear Mr Kudu,

I am pleased to inform you that it will not be necessary to make a bank transfer because - as I informed you in an earlier e-mail - the director of the Holy Bagel Community, Bishop Tossov of Mbalongawank, will be in Dakar this month and he has five hundred US dollars in cash to pay your legal fees.

The Bishop will be in Dakar from Thursday June 13 to Sunday June 16 and is staying at the Radisson Blu Hotel, Route de la Corniche Ouest. As you can imagine, he has many engagements during this short stay. Therefore on Friday morning he will leave $500 in an envelope at the hotel reception desk marked For the Attention of Mr Kudu. You will be asked to present proof of identity - like a driving licence - and sign the receipt which is also in the envelope and give it to the reception clerk.

If you have any queries feel free to contact Bishop Tossov at lonslo-tossov@hotmail.com

Remain blessed,

SISTER TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

messages.body:
Dear Tushie,
Your mail was well received.  Please, I do not have time for Jokes !! OK ? Be cause I am a busy type.   How dare you telling me to be chasing your director  from Hotel,?  Well as a matter of Fact, I do not have that kind of Chance to do so OK ? When your director arrives, He should come to My Chamber here, and follow protocols. That is how others do OK ? Meanwhile , I have been away from my country for few weeks now, I am in GAMBIA one of the African countries very close to Senegal . But, you will meet my secretary when you arrive. OK ? Thanks. Bar. Kudu.
messages.raw:
BARRISTER LONG KUDU

Date: Tue, 11 Jun 2013

Dear Tushie,
Your mail was well received. Please, I do not have time for Jokes !! OK ? Be cause I am a busy type. How dare you telling me to be chasing your director from Hotel,? Well as a matter of Fact, I do not have that kind of Chance to do so OK ? When your director arrives, He should come to My Chamber here, and follow protocols. That is how others do OK ? Meanwhile , I have been away from my country for few weeks now, I am in GAMBIA one of the African countries very close to Senegal . But, you will meet my secretary when you arrive. OK ? Thanks. Bar. Kudu.

messages.body:
Kudu,


So  picking up an envelope from a leading hotel in Dakar is somehow beneath your dignity. 


Of course, the truth is simply that you are a stupid idiot. Do you really think that 
anyone with a grain of common sense would believe you are really a lawyer? 


I know you are a common Nigerian style 419 scammer. The tale of a young refugee with
a huge amount of money that can only be taken out of the country by a foreigner with the
aid of a lawyer is so old that I am surprised to see it still being used. 


But let me inform you, Mugu, that your e-mail details have been forwarded to the
International Internet Criminal Investigations Force because the Nigerian police can be easily bribed.
So you and your Oga can expect a visit from Captain Makalele of the IICIF  in the next few days.


LIEUTENANT TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
International Internet Criminal Investigations Force
P.O.Box 69
London FU2 GIT
United Kingdom
messages.raw:

But let me inform you, Mugu, that your e-mail details have been forwarded to the International Internet Criminal Investigations Force because the Nigerian police can be easily bribed. So you and your Oga can expect a visit from Captain Makalele of the IICIF in the next few days.

But very dangerous.! Repent or you will go to hell.!!

messages.body:
Kudu,


Are you out of your mind? I am an officer of an International organisation
dedicated to stopping 419 scams most of which originate from Nigeria. YOU are the 
person who tried to scam me out of $500 for 'legal fees'.


You are not a lawyer and there is no "Baby Blessing" living in a refugee camp 
in Dakar or anywhere else. She is a figment of your Oga's imagination.


Now listen - you are a very foolish fellow but you are not one of the leading
criminals.  


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
messages.raw:
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Date: June 13, 2013

Kudu,

Are you out of your mind? I am an officer of an International organisation dedicated to stopping 419 scams most of which originate from Nigeria. YOU are the person who tried to scam me out of $500 for 'legal fees'.

You are not a lawyer and there is no "Baby Blessing" living in a refugee camp in Dakar or anywhere else. She is a figment of your Oga's imagination.

Now listen - you are a very foolish fellow but you are not one of the leading criminals.

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.body:

I should have added that as you are not one of the leading criminals we 
have decided not to prosecute you on this occasion.


But be warned - we will take further action if you continue to send these
fraudulent e-mails.


LIEUTENANT TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
International Internet Criminal Investigations Force
P.O.Box 69
London FU2 GIT
United Kingdom
